sourcesContent:
Player

{{player.score}}

Name {{element.name}} Three Darts Avg. {{element.threeDartAvg}} First Nine Avg. {{element.firstNine}} Highest Score {{element.highestScore}}
import {Component, Input} from '@angular/core'; import {Player} from "../../interfaces/Player"; import {GameStats} from "../../interfaces/GameStats"; @Component({ selector: 'app-player-box', templateUrl: './player-box.component.html', styleUrls: ['./player-box.component.css'], }) export class PlayerBoxComponent { @Input() player: Player; progress: number = 50; @Input() gameHasStarted: boolean; displayedColumns: string[] = ['player', 'threeDartAvg', 'firstNine', 'highestScore']; dataSource: GameStats[]; }
